title: Error preventing me from inviting people
body: Everytime i open up draft normal or ranked it says error...to fix start over client. I've restarted it multiple times yet it still happens..help please

replies.body:
This error is actually a [result of us disabling Club Tags](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ih5gWw8j-56-club-tag-creation-disabled-and-server-error-message-in-client).  The error message itself doesn't negatively affect the client, except that it will wipe your quick invite list in the lobby.  you should be able to invite friends through the actually invite button however.

Let me know if you still aren't able to invite everyone!
Ok.....thank you. I'm able to invite my friends through the invite button
